candidates.reason: Swarm Consensus (7 votes): groq: As a Bitcoin mining stock, RIOT follows crypto cycles and exhibits high volatility, similar to MARA. Swarm Consensus (3 votes): xai: CLSK (CleanSpark) mirrors WULF and MARA as a Bitcoin mining company with high volatility and boom/bust cycles linked to crypto market fluctuations. Like EQT's commodity cycles, it follows energy-intensive mining trends influenced by electricity costs and halvings. After recent weakness from broader crypto sell-offs, it shows oversold conditions ripe for mean reversion, especially with potential sector rotation into renewable energy plays in mining. Aligns with goldmine crypto exposure and volatility; could gain meme traction via retail interest in 'green' mining.; claude_haiku: Cryptocurrency mining company with similar macro sensitivity to WULF.
